contents.contents: Walk down the “Rue du petit cimetière de Sainte-Croix” and straight ahead into the “Rue Toussaint Rose” then turn right into the “Rue Valentin Abeille” and then walk into the Garnier garden.

contents.alt: Photo of the entrance to the garden

contents.contents: Today, it is a public garden.
The first to find the statue represented in the picture is the winner!

question.contents: Have a look at the statue of the man who gave his name to the garden. Who was he?

explanations.contents: Victor Garnier gave his name to the garden.
